name: UpdateCustomEnvironment
description:
Update a custom environment for a Vercel project.

Use this tool to update a custom environment in a Vercel project. The environment should not be named 'Production' or 'Preview'. Useful for managing project-specific settings.

parameters.name: project_identifier_or_name
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or project name for the custom environment.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: custom_environment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom environment within the project.

value_schema.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team to perform the update on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The slug of the custom environment.

parameters.name: custom_environment_slug
parameters.description: Slug of the custom environment to update. Must not be 'Production' or 'Preview'.

value_schema.description: The slug of the custom environment.

parameters.name: custom_environment_description
parameters.description: Optional description of the custom environment to be updated.

value_schema.description: Description of the custom environment. This is optional.

parameters.name: branch_matcher_type
parameters.description: Specifies the branch matcher type: 'equals', 'startsWith', or 'endsWith'.

value_schema.description: Type of matcher. One of \"equals\", \"startsWith\", or \"endsWith\".

parameters.name: branch_name_pattern
parameters.description: Specify a portion or full Git branch name for matching. Used to identify branches in custom environments.

value_schema.description: Git branch name or portion thereof.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: environmentSlugOrId
parameters.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

value_schema.description: The unique custom environment identifier within the project

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The slug of the custom environment.

value_schema.description: The slug of the custom environment.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the custom environment. This is optional.

value_schema.description: Description of the custom environment. This is optional.

parameters.name: branchMatcher.type
parameters.description: Type of matcher. One of \"equals\", \"startsWith\", or \"endsWith\".

value_schema.description: Type of matcher. One of \"equals\", \"startsWith\", or \"endsWith\".

parameters.name: branchMatcher.pattern
parameters.description: Git branch name or portion thereof.

value_schema.description: Git branch name or portion thereof.
